newsitem.title: RUSSIA: PRESS DIGEST - RUSSIA IZVESTIA - JUNE 5.
newsitem.headline: PRESS DIGEST - RUSSIA IZVESTIA - JUNE 5.

text.p: The following are some of the leading stories in the June 6 edition of Russia's Izvestia newspaper. Reuters has not verified these stories and does not vouch for their accuracy.
- Russia's only metallurgical giant that has managed to remain independent of transnational corporations is about to die because of internal problems eroding the Krasnoyarsk smelter.
- The Russian army does not have enough money to feed its soldiers properly, as it has received only 19 percent of funds budgeted by the government, according to the Duma's defence committee.
- Russians have squirreled away about $8.6 billion in 1996, according to a state statistics report.
